snippet.title: New Video from Bakery Biz Tycoon Game
snippet.description:
New video material from the Bakery Biz Tycoon game, which will soon be available in early access on the STEAM platform. Check out more details on our website or on the steam page.

Bakery Biz Tycoon - https://www.bango-games.com/bakerytycoon/
Bango.Games Store - https://www.bango-games.com/store/
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101780/Bakery_Biz_Tycoon/

It took some time since I put screenshots of the older version of the Bakery Biz Tycoon game. I finished work on the first town of Middelton. It is not fully animated yet, but the whole project will allow to add more animations and objects like the player's vehicles or vans in the future. I also improved the interface throughout the game and a few bugs.  And I decided to show you current screenshots and a small trailer. I hope that it will bring you closer to the game and how it will look.
